phrases: It appeared as though humanity would be destroyed by the demons.
But a single mage saved them all.
He was called the Wizard King, and he became a legend.
Is that all you have got, Captain of the Crimson Lion Kings?
for just a moment, the barrier's mana thins in places.
That is what I aimed for.
Even if you possess extraordinary abilities and polish them to their fullest,
without a righteous spirit, your deeds are nothing but violence!
No one will acknowledge something like that!
I need to get stronger so things like this do not give me so much trouble.
It is too early for you to be cheering just yet.
I think everything's just about ready.
Now for some lively sow's mana...
I would always close my eyes
Of just making excuses to give up
I do not want to be near you
(The decisive battle is still a long way off)
I will give up on giving up
And get the world on my side
I am looking for the reason I am alive
Every time somewhere under this sky
And head where the light shines
I want to keep my promise
I will deliver it to you
I have magic that is stronger than anyone else's.
I studied everything there was about my magic, polished my skills, and prepared!
I made him evaporate with intense firepower!
You are definitely a man worthy of leading this country!
I have got as much magic as a royal!
There are many questions I would like to ask you.
But before that, I will be confiscating your grimoire.
He can only use one spell?
Do not you dare look down on me!
Who is going to look down on you?
Could not you think of any other way to get people to acknowledge your power?
You have amazing magic, and you were strong enough to claw your way up...
I will lend you my arm.
What you lacked to overcome adversity...
It was impossible for you to beat a captain on your own after all.
The sheer volume of your magic is not enough.
I am also reaching my limit.
You are through acting on your own.
From now on, things are going to go as planned.
Now, then, I think I will go have some dessert.
Would you like to join me?
Let us go back to our lodgings and wash off all this sweat, Sis.
Looks like they are in the marked areas.
It would appear that we are at least
a few hundred kilometers away from the royal capital.
They managed to infiltrate the royal capital.
I figured they must have had a rather skilled spatial magic user, but...
To think they were able to send us all this far.
To think the great Magic Knights would all fall for a silly trap like that.
I was supposed to play with the stragglers, but it looks like I will not have to bother.
I would better use this time to get some nice, young mana.
Ash Curse Magic: Ash Absorbing Formation.
Even water would bounce right off of it.
Stop acting all cute, you sow!
Well, are not you a handsome young man?
Say, do you think I am pretty?
Who are you calling a monster?!
I guess someone was able to escape that spatial magic.
My, you are hot and my type.
Say, want to have some fun with me?
My, you are hot and my type.
Say, want to have some fun with me?
Who are you calling an old hag?!
Ash Curse Magic: Cheerful Ash Destruction.
These are curse bullets with various curses inside.
You will not know what you will get until they hit.
Look at you, with such ample time to talk.
Well, since you are hot, I guess I will tell you.
We are here to eliminate someone.
Who do you think it is, darling?
Well, I am definitely not going to tell you.
You are working with at least one other.
A spatial magic user must have infiltrated the royal capital.
No matter where you might have sent the rest of the Magic Knights,
you do not have enough power to take over the royal capital.
I cannot imagine that this was just to go after the king.
You have made it clear that your motive is revenge,
but what are you and the others after overall?
She has a tremendous amount of magic.
These ash bullets themselves do not do much damage, but...
It looks like you are having a hard time getting around.
I wonder what you have been hit with.
I am gradually losing sensation throughout my body, too.
My Ash Curse Magic: Cheerful Ash Destruction works very gradually.
First, your eyes stop working, then your ears,
and then your body stops moving.
You will pay for having the insolence to call me an old hag.
People expected a lot from my four-leaf clover...
I even joined the top Magic Knights squad, the Golden Dawn.
Who cares about a four-leaf clover?
That stupid peasant, getting a big head...
He lacks the talent worthy to be a member of the Golden Dawn.
I am sure he will not last long.
All those voices around me do not matter.
I am only bettering myself so I will not lose.
What defeated that guy was a power I just happened upon,
That power does not seem to want to listen to me.
The only reason I was able to avoid the spatial magic earlier
was because something other than my own power reacted.
It is not like we are expecting anything from that peasant.
That is not why I am frustrated.
You have to aim properly, like this.
If you say, I am sorry, miss, and adorably beg for your life, I will forgive you.
This is... the flow of mana?
It is said that mages with wind-based mana are excellent at detecting mana.
With all five senses cut off
and his back against the wall, Yuno's finely honed concentration
demonstrated an astonishing ability to detect mana,
and was attempting to go beyond even that.
Come on, hurry up and beg for your life.
If you do not, I am just going to have to kill you.
There are so many things I want to ask you.
I could not care less about you.
The spirit has constantly been sending me mana signs.
I was relying so much on my sight and hearing that I was not noticing them.
Let me just tell you one thing about me.
hate losing more than anything else!
I have to use the magic I stole to defend myself, or I will
My dry emotions gaze at the me from that day
(I cannot find a place to go)
Even the faintest light can still break through the darkness
And change the flow of time
In order to grasp my endless dream
If there is a path that I should choose
Until my life comes to an end
I will accept any pain that comes my way
(We can try again, we can try again)
Even if we cannot see tomorrow
Holding onto feelings too intense to voice
I will keep screaming them in my heart
I was able to get the wind spirit to listen to me.
I shall name her Bell, and today is Bell's birthday.
This cake is for you, Bell.
Should we say you are one year old?
Make a wish and blow out the candles.
What did you do with my brother?!
Answer wisely, or you shall face my wrath!
I am calm at all times...
